properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 4:00AM EST until February 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 1 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY
